page.title: 16Language
page.content: cuddy = donkey lug = ear kessen=sheep on back and can'tget up beck = stream yonder = there dike = hedge aye = yes braw = lovely and good ken = know bairn = small child galluses = braces cowp = turn over marra = friend gowk = cuckoo tup or tip = ram laik = play kevel = heave or leap about kevel = heave or leap about clart = mess about mire=mud bank=large piece of wood beal=cry goller=shout bray=hit brat=apron neb=nose fettle=fix yan=one tyan=two tethera/three methera/four pim/five sethera=six lethera=seven hovera=eight dovera=nine dick=ten yanadick=eleven tyanadick=twelve tetheradick=thirteen metheradick=fourteen bumfit=fifteen yanabumfit=16 tyanabumfit=17 tetherabumfit=18 metherabumfit=19 giggot=20
